AcceptedFactionInvite: Triggered when a faction invite has been accepted.
AcceptedSafehouseInvite: Triggered when a safehouse invite has been accepted.
AcceptedTrade: Triggered when a trade request has been accepted.
AddXP: Triggered when a player gains XP.
Attack: Triggered when a character is performing an attack.
AutoDrink: Triggered when a character is drinking automatically.
CalculateStats: Triggered when a character stats are being calculated.
LevelPerk: Triggered when a perk is being leveled up.
LoadGridsquare: Triggered when a square is being loaded.
OnAIStateChange: Triggered before an AI state is being changed.
OnAIStateEnter: Triggered when an AI state is being entered.
OnAIStateExecute: Triggered when an AI state is being executed.
OnAIStateExit: Triggered when an AI state is being exited.
OnAddBuilding: Triggered when a building is being added to the map.
OnAddMessage: Triggered when a chat message is being sent.
OnAdminMessage: Triggered when a chat message from the server admin is being sent.
OnAmbientSound: Triggered when an ambient sound starts.
OnBeingHitByZombie: Triggered when a character is being hit by a zombie.
OnChallengeQuery: Triggered when the challenge options are getting populated.
OnChangeWeather: Triggered when the weather is changing.
OnCharacterCollide: Triggered when two characters collide together.
OnCharacterCreateStats: Triggered when the stats of a character are being created.
OnCharacterMeet: Triggered when a survivor meets another character.
OnChatWindowInit: Triggered when the chat window is being initialized.
OnClientCommand: Triggered when the player sends a command to the server.
OnClimateManagerInit: Triggered after the ClimateManager has been initialized.
OnClimateTickDebug: Triggered for every climate tick but only when debug mode is enabled.
OnClothingUpdated: Triggered when a character's clothing items are updated.
OnConnectFailed: Triggered when the connection to the server has failed.
OnConnected: Triggered when the player successfully connects to the server.
OnConnectionStateChanged: When a player is connecting to the server, the connection is going through different stages. This event is triggered for each of these stages of the initial connection.
OnContainerUpdate: Triggered when a container is being updated.
OnCoopJoinFailed: Triggered when a player fails to join a cooperative game.
OnCoopServerMessage: Triggered when the player receives a server message during a cooperative game.
OnCreateLivingCharacter: Triggered when either a player or survivor is being created.
OnCreatePlayer: Triggered when a player is being created.
OnCreateSurvivor: Triggered when a survivor is being created.
OnCustomUIKey: Triggered when a custom UI key has been released.
OnCustomUIKeyPressed: Triggered when a custom UI key has been pressed.
OnCustomUIKeyReleased: Triggered when a custom UI key has been released.
OnDestroyIsoThumpable: Triggered when a thumpable object is being destroyed.
OnDeviceText: Triggered when a media device is displaying text.
OnDisconnect: Triggered when the player disconnects from the server.
OnDistributionMerge: Triggered before merging the world distribution.
OnDoTileBuilding: Triggered when a building tile is being set.
OnDoTileBuilding2: Triggered when a building tile is being set.
OnDoTileBuilding3: Triggered when a building tile is being set.
OnEnterVehicle: Triggered when a player successfully enters a vehicle.
OnEquipPrimary: Triggered when a character equips an item in its primary slot.
OnEquipSecondary: Triggered when a character equips an item in its secondary slot.
OnExitVehicle: Triggered when a character is exiting a vehicle.
OnFETick: Same as OnTick, except is only called while on the main menu.
OnFillContainer: Triggered after a container has been filled.
OnFillInventoryObjectContextMenu: Triggered when inventory object context menus are being filled.
OnFillWorldObjectContextMenu: Triggered when world object context menus are being filled.
OnGameBoot: Triggered when either a game or a server is being started, or when mods are getting reloaded during a game.
OnGameStart: Triggered after the start of a new game, and after a saved game has been loaded.
OnGameTimeLoaded: Triggered after the [[GameTime]] has been initialized.
OnGamepadConnect: Triggered when a gamepad has been connected.
OnGamepadDisconnect: Triggered when a gamepad has been disconnected.
OnGridBurnt: Triggered when a grid square is burning.
OnHitZombie: Triggered when a character hits a zombie.
OnInitGlobalModData: Triggered after GlobalModData has been initialized.
OnInitRecordedMedia: Triggered when a media is being recorded.
OnInitSeasons: Triggered when the seasons have been initialized.
OnInitWorld: Triggered during the process of initializing the world.
OnIsoThumpableLoad: Triggered when a thumpable object is being loaded.
OnIsoThumpableSave: Triggered when a thumpable object is being saved.
OnJoypadActivate: Triggered when a controller is activated.
OnKeyKeepPressed: Triggered when a keyboard key is being held down.
OnKeyPressed: Triggered when a keyboard key is being pressed.
OnKeyStartPressed: Triggered when a keyboard key is initially being pressed.
OnLoad: Triggered when a game is loading, after [[Modding:Lua Events/OnGameStart|OnGameStart]].
OnLoadMapZones: Triggered when IsoWorld initialises and is registering the zones for the map.
OnLoadRadioScripts: Triggered when radio scripts are being loaded.
OnLoadSoundBanks: Triggered when sound banks are loaded for the game.
OnLoadedTileDefinitions: Triggered after tiles definitions have been loaded.
OnMainMenuEnter: Triggered when main menu is displayed to users. This can occur either when they launch the game, or when they quit a running game.
OnMouseDown: Triggered when the mouse button is down.
OnMouseMove: Triggered when the mouse is moved.
OnMouseUp: Triggered when the mouse button is released.
OnNPCSurvivorUpdate: Triggered when a survivor is being updated.
OnNewGame: Triggered after a new world has been initialized.
OnObjectAdded: Triggered when an object is added to the map.
OnObjectCollide: Triggered when a character collides with an object.
OnObjectLeftMouseButtonDown: Triggered when left mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]
OnObjectLeftMouseButtonUp: Triggered when left mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]
OnObjectRightMouseButtonDown: Triggered when right mouse button clicked on [[IsoObject]]
OnObjectRightMouseButtonUp: Triggered when right mouse button is released on [[IsoObject]]
OnPlayerAttackFinished: Triggered when a character is done performing an attack.
OnPlayerCancelTimedAction: Triggered when a player cancels a timed action.
OnPlayerMove: Triggered while the player is moving.
OnPlayerSetSafehouse: Triggered when survivor group has their safehouse set.
OnPlayerUpdate: Triggered when a player is being updated.
OnPostFloorLayerDraw: Triggered after a floor layer is rendered.
OnPostMapLoad: Triggered after a cell is loaded.
OnPostSave: Triggered after a game has been saved.
OnPostUIDraw: Triggered by UI Manager in its render function after the UI has been drawn.
OnPreFillInventoryObjectContextMenu: Triggered before context menus get filled with options.
OnPreFillWorldObjectContextMenu: Triggered before context menu for world objects is filled.
OnPreMapLoad: Triggered before a map is loaded.
OnPreUIDraw: Triggered by UI Manager in its render function before the UI gets drawn.
OnPressRackButton: Triggered when a player hits the button to rack a firearm.
OnPressReloadButton: Triggered when a player hits the  button to reload a firearm.
OnRefreshInventoryWindowContainers: Triggered during the process of refreshing inventory containers.
OnRenderUpdate: Triggered every time Display.update() is called..
OnResolutionChange: Triggered when game resolution has changed.
OnRightMouseDown: Triggered when right mouse button is down.
OnRightMouseUp: Triggered when mouse button is released.
OnSafehousesChanged: Triggered when the safehouse is being changed.
OnSave: Triggered during the game's saving process.
OnScoreboardUpdate: Triggered when multiplayer scoreboard is updated.
OnSeeNewRoom: Triggered when a room is being seen by a character for the first time.
OnSpawnRegionsLoaded: Triggered after spawn regions are loaded.
OnSteamGameJoin: Triggered when joining a game through Steam.
OnTabAdded: Triggered when a chat tab is added.
OnTabRemoved: Triggered when a chat tab is closed.
OnThunderEvent: Triggered when a thunderstorm is about to start.
OnTick: Triggered every tick, try to not use this one, use EveryTenMinutes instead because it can create a lot of frame loss/garbage collection.
OnTickEvenPaused: Same as OnTick, but triggered when the game is paused as well.
OnTileRemoved: Triggered when a tile object has been removed.
OnTriggerNPCEvent: Called when a NPC event is triggered.
OnUseVehicle: Triggered when a character is using a vehicle.
OnVehicleHorn: Triggered when a character is using a vehicle horn.
OnWaterAmountChange: Triggered when the amount of water in an object has changed.
OnWeaponHitCharacter: Triggered when a character has been hit by a weapon.
OnWeaponHitTree: Triggered when a character hits a tree with a hand weapon.
OnWeaponSwing: Triggered when a player swings a hand weapon.
OnWeaponSwingHitPoint: Triggered when a hand weapon has reached the apex of its swing.
OnWorldMessage: Triggered when a world message is being received.
OnZombieUpdate: Triggered when a zombie is being updated.
ReceiveFactionInvite: Triggered when a player is invited to join a faction.
ReceiveSafehouseInvite: Triggered when a player is invited to a safehouse.
RequestTrade: Triggered when a character is requesting a trade with another character.
onLoadModDataFromServer: Triggered after ModData has been received from the server.
